hero.title: Fast-track your way into programming
hero.subtitle: Learn to code in 6 weeks with live classes and intensive practice

about.title: 📌 About the Bootcamp
about.description: CodeYourWay Ignite Express is an intensive live course for those who want to enter the programming world in an accelerated way. Our focus is on practical skills, with dynamic classes and real exercises from day one.

hours.title: 📌 Total Workload: 34 hours
items: ✅ Live classes: 2x per week (3h each) → 24 hours
✅ Extra live classes: Mentoring and review → 10 hours
✅ Recorded classes: Complement the practical content

objective.title: 🎯 Ignite Express Objective
objective.description: The objective of this program is to teach the basics of web programming, with JavaScript from day one, as well as HTML and CSS as support to develop complete projects.

strategy.title: 🔥 Learning Strategy
items: ✅ Focus on logic and JavaScript from the first class
✅ HTML and CSS as support for learning JS (not the other way around)
✅ Practical use of Git and GitHub Pages for early deployment
✅ Mini practical projects for each major concept learned

topics.title: 🎓 Currículum
topics.subtitle: Our curriculum has been carefully structured to maximize your learning in 6 weeks, including 2 weeks of warm-up and 4 weeks of live classes.

weeks.title: Warm up and intro
items: Day to day of a programmer

weeks.title: Week 1: Web Fundamentals and Introduction to JavaScript
items: 📌 Introduction to HTML, CSS and GitHub Pages
📌 Creating a first static site and publishing on GitHub Pages
📌 Introduction to JavaScript: Variables, Data Types and Operators

weeks.title: Week 2: Essential JavaScript and DOM Manipulation
items: 📌 DOM manipulation: querySelector, events and interactions

weeks.title: Week 3: Advanced JavaScript and Data Storage
Week 4: APIs, Advanced Git and Project Publishing
items: 📌 Working with public APIs using fetch()
📌 Creating a Weather App with external API
📌 Code versioning and branches on GitHub
📌 Creating a basic portfolio to publish the projects made in the course
📌 AI Immersion: Automating your workflow and accelerating your learning

mentors.title: 🎙 Mentors
mentors.subtitle: Learn from experienced professionals working in the market

list.name: Frederico Bezerra
achievements: Over 14 years of experience in Startups and Tech Companies

list.name: Yago
achievements: Specialist in teaching and agile methodologies
Author of several online programming courses

style.title: 📌 Tone and Style
items: ✅ Straight to the point, clear and objective
✅ Focus on accelerated learning and practice
✅ Not talking about 'career', but about skills and entering the world of technology
✅ Emphasis on live classes and intense practice
✅ Motivational, showing that anyone can learn programming quickly

cta.title: 🔥 Call to Action
lines: 📢 Enrollments for CodeYourWay Ignite Foundations are open!
💡 Start your journey in programming with live classes and intense practice!
📅 Start in April 2025 - Reserve your spot now!

form.title: Sign up for CodeYourWay Ignite
form.subtitle: Fill out the form below to secure your spot in the next bootcamp.

success.title: Registration received!
success.message: We'll be in touch soon with more information about the bootcamp.

benefits.title: What's included:
items: Special AI immersion to accelerate your learning up to 10x

vacancies.title: Limited spots!
vacancies.message: We only have 30 spots available for this class.

waitlist.title: Join the waiting list
waitlist.message: Be the first to know about new bootcamps in english and exclusive offers

meta.title: CodeYourWay Express | Programming Bootcamp
meta.description: CodeYourWay Ignite Express - Learn web programming fundamentals in 4 weeks with live classes and intensive practice. Bootcamp with JavaScript, HTML, CSS and Artificial Intelligence.
